resources.string: • Pull out the options menu by swiping from the left of the screen.
• Use the personalise menu to rename the switches and inputs to whatever you have linked them to.
• Interupts work like inputs but can also be used to trigger events (see firmware source).
• The icon in the middle denotes connection status (glowing = connected).
Designed to be used with Texuino automation board. More information and link to buy can be found at: www.twitter.com/texuino. For support email stfneur@gmail.com.
